isis.stitle: AIR CONDITIONING - HEATER SYSTEM: 9000 Pro Sleeper After 05/01/1997, and 9800 Model After 07/01/1997 - OPERATION - FRESH AIR VENTILATION

svcproc.title: FRESH AIR VENTILATION
svcproc.para: Fresh air is controlled by pushing the PULL-RECIRC knob on the instrument panel ( Figure 2). With the HOT-COLD lever in the cold position and the A/C switch off, fresh air flows through the outlet selected by the AIR OUTLET lever. To increase the amount of fresh air entering the cab in the ventilation mode, the blower can be used. The fan speed and the air outlets can be adjusted to obtain the desired air flow.
